overview: In her store“Hipnos”, Elena buys and sells dreams for those looking for an escape. On what seems like any other day, Elena encounters a dream that forces her to reckon what she had ignored. Questioning her reality, she must go back through a distant past, although the answers she finds are not what she expected.
tagline: Elena, a dream seller, is forced to question her reality after finding an error in her inventory.
title: Hipnos
